paper_title: Supersingular Isogeny Graphs from Algebraic Modular Curves
abstract:
We describe algorithms for computing supersingular $\ell$-isogeny graphs using algebraic models of modular curves. The algorithms we describe were used to compute all supersingular isogeny graphs for all pairs $(p,\ell)$ with $p \leq 2048$ and $\ell \leq 13$.
  In addition, we use our results to prove a conjecture posed by Nakaya.
publication_venue: 20 pages. Changes in V2: Simplified proofs in section 2; Added models of X_0(l)^+ to section 3; Added algorithms using X_0(l)^+ to section 4; added trace formula and proof of Conjecture 2 to section 5; Added appendix with Hilbert functions
